  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4571</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">To Show that Starch is Produced in Photosynthesis</string>
            <string language="es">Para mostrar que el almidón se produce en la fotosíntesis</string>
            <string language="ga">A léiriú go ndéantar Stáirse i rith Fótaisintéis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeigen, daß Stärke in der Fotosynthese 
produziert wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour prouver que l'amidon est produit dans la 
photosynthèse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para mostrar que o starch está produzido na 
fotossíntese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per indicare che l'amido è prodotto nella 
fotosintesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να δείξει ότι το άμυλο παράγεται στη φωτοσύνθεση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for conducting an experiment to show that starch is produced during photosynthesis.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para llevar a cabo un experimento que muestre que el almidón se produce durante la fotosíntesis.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha chun turgnamh a dhéanamh a chruthaíonn go ndéantar stáirse i rith fótaisintéis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">AnimalPlant Biology</string>
            <string language="es">Biología</string>
            <string language="ga">Bitheolaíocht AinmhíPlanda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Experiment</string>
            <string language="es">Animales</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnamh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen für das Leiten eines Experimentes, 
um zu zeigen, daß Stärke während der Fotosynthese produziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions pour entreprendre une expérience 
pour prouver que l'amidon est produit pendant la photosynthèse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções para conduzir uma experiência para 
mostrar que o starch está produzido durante a fotossíntese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni per eseguire un esperimento per 
indicare che l'amido è prodotto durante la fotosintesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για να πραγματοποιήσει ένα πείραμα για να 
δείξει ότι το άμυλο παράγεται κατά τη διάρκεια της 
φωτοσύνθεσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">AnimalPlant Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie d'AnimalPlant</string>
